sen.e: With the decline in the power of the Tang Dynasty which had governed China, the dispatch of the Japanese envoy to Tang Dynasty had been suspended since the middle of the ninth century (officially, envoys to Tang China were abolished in 894), which resulted in the appearance of Japan's original national culture (the Kokufu Bunka).
